name: Misfortune (poopfireshots)
description:
This is a game made for the Experimental Gameplay class in 2 days with the theme "Earthy" in mind. I chose to create a weird dark comedy game, following in the direction of "earthy humour", wherein the player tries to navigate through a city while avoiding unfortunate events. Will you be able reach the goal? 

Uses assets from: 

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/2d-characters-family-136183
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/city-pack-top-down-p...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-top-down-basic-1...
